    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Armature de sources radioactives</string>
            <string language="en">Shielding radioactive sources</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abschirmung der radioaktiven Quellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Protegendo fontes radioativas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Protezione delle sorgenti radioattive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προστασία των ραδιενεργών πηγών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Blindar fuentes radiactivas</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre protéger une petite  source radioactive (dessus) et une grande source radioactive très  puissante (bas) d'atteindre nos corps.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows shielding a small radioactive source (top) and a large very powerful radioactive source (bottom) from reaching our bodies.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">absorption</string>
            <string language="en">absorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">béton</string>
            <string language="en">Concrete</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">caisses en métal</string>
            <string language="en">metal cases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">centrales nucléaires</string>
            <string language="en">nuclear power stations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">radiation</string>
            <string language="en">Radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">sources radioactives</string>
            <string language="en">radioactive sources</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">protégeant</string>
            <string language="en">shielding</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">acier</string>
            <string language="en">steel</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Abschirmung einer kleinen
radioaktiven Quelle (Oberseite) und der großen sehr leistungsfähigen
radioaktiven Quelle (Unterseite) vom Erreichen unserer Körper.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra proteger uma fonte 
radioativa pequena (alto) e uma fonte radioativa muito poderosa grande
(fundo) de alcançar nossos corpos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la protezione una 
sorgente radioattiva piccola (parte superiore) e di grande sorgente 
radioattiva molto potente (parte inferiore) dal raggiungere i nostri 
corpi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει προστασία μιας μικρής 
ραδιενεργού πηγής (κορυφή) και μιας μεγάλης πολύ ισχυρής 
ραδιενεργού πηγής (κατώτατο σημείο) από την επίτευξη των 
οργανισμών μας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra blindar una fuente 
radiactiva pequeña (tapa) y una fuente radiactiva muy de gran alcance
grande (fondo) de alcanzar nuestros cuerpos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Absorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konkret</string>
          </keyword>
